page.title: 17PUB
page.content: The Red Lion Inn, Babcary is well situated at the end of the main street of Babcary, and it is licensed to sell wines,spirits and tobacco. The owner told us that the pub was quite busy most evenings, but even more so on Friday and Saturday evenings The pub is not a residential one,as the name suggests. It is thought that the main building was built in the Fourteenth Century. The pub opens at eleven o'clock in the morning,and at half past six in the evening. There are three main rooms on the ground floor and there is also a garden behind the pub, where people like to go on summer evenings. The pub is also reputated for having good food.
